patthana8.27:1.1: Naganthaniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthaniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naganthaniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naganthaniyo ca naaganthaniyo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana8.27:2.1: Naaganthaniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.27:3.1: Naganthaniyañca naaganthaniyañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naaganthaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.27:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca. (Sabbattha pañca.)
